ban.name: ban
ban.success: The specified user has been successfully banned and successfully received a notification!
ban.success_no_notification: The given user has been successfully banned, but has not received a notification!
ban.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while trying to ban the user

clear.name: clear
clear.amount_description: The number of messages to delete (1-100)
clear.more_than_100: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** I cannot delete more than 100 messages at a time!
clear.less_than_1: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** I cannot delete less than 1 message!
clear.invalid_amount: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Please specify a valid number between 1 and 100
clear.older_than_14d: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You can only bulk delete messages that are under 14 days old.
clear.success: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** I have successfully deleted {{amount}} the messages
clear.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** There was an error trying to delete messages in this channel!

clearuser.name: clearuser

option.user: The user whose messages to clear
option.amount: The number of messages to delete (1-100)

clearuser.invalid_args: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Please specify a valid number between 1 and 100 or a user mention
clearuser.user_not_found: I cannot find the user you mentioned

kick.name: kick
kick.success: The specified user has been successfully kicked and successfully received a notification!
kick.success_no_notification: The given user has been successfully kicked, but has not received a notification!
kick.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while trying to kick the user

setwarn.name: setwarn
setwarn.description: Set warning level for a user
setwarn.user_option: The user to set warnings for
setwarn.count_option: The number of warnings to set
setwarn.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while setting warnings

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Timeout users for a certain time
timeout.more_than_28d: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Invalid input time or time is larger than 28 days
timeout.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while trying to timeout the user
timeout.success_timeout_from: You have been timed out in {{guildName}}

warn.name: warn
warn.title: ğŸ”¨ãƒ»Warn
warn.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while trying to warn the user

thread_remove.name: thread_remove
thread_remove.description: Remove a member from this thread
thread_remove.user_option: The member to remove from the thread
thread_remove.not_thread: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** This command can only be used in threads
thread_remove.archived: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Cannot remove members from archived threads
thread_remove.not_member: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You must be a member of this private thread to remove others
thread_remove.target_not_member: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** {{target}} is not a member of this thread
thread_remove.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Failed to remove member from thread
